Class CmtBigIntegerCommitValue

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.biu.scapi.interactiveMidProtocols.commitmentScheme.CmtBigIntegerCommitValue
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CmtCommitValue

    public class CmtBigIntegerCommitValue
extends java.lang.Object
implements CmtCommitValue
    Concrete implementation of CommitValue where the committed value is a BigInteger.
    Author:
    Cryptography and Computer Security Research Group Department of Computer Science Bar-Ilan University (Yael Ejgenberg)
